author: Mary Regan
title: Virus fallout could force politicians further apart
description: The emergency laws passing through the Oireachtas are extraordinary not just in their scope and scale, but in how they have prompted the political system to quickly adapt, writes Mary Regan.
content:
The emergency laws passing through the Oireachtas are extraordinary not just in their scope and scale, but in how they have prompted the political system to quickly adapt.
